seeds.name: Tomato Seeds
seeds.description: Produces bright red, juicy tomatoes rich in vitamins and antioxidants. Ideal for salads, sauces, and fresh consumption.

seeds.name: Carrot Seeds
seeds.description: Grows into vibrant orange carrots packed with beta-carotene and nutrients. Perfect for raw consumption, salads, and cooking.

seeds.name: Spinach Seeds
seeds.description: Yields dark green, nutrient-dense spinach leaves rich in iron and fiber. Great for salads, smoothies, and cooked dishes.

seeds.name: Cucumber Seeds
seeds.description: Produces refreshing, hydrating cucumbers rich in vitamins and antioxidants. Ideal for salads and detox water.

seeds.name: Brinjal Seeds
seeds.description: Also known as eggplant, grows into purple, fleshy vegetables used in curries, grills, and stir-fries. High in fiber and antioxidants.

seeds.name: Pumpkin Seeds
seeds.description: Produces large, nutrient-rich pumpkins great for soups, pies, and roasting. Seeds are also edible and packed with protein.

seeds.name: Coriander Seeds
seeds.description: Grows into fresh coriander leaves widely used in cooking for their aromatic flavor. Seeds can also be used as a spice.

seeds.name: Watermelon Seeds
seeds.description: Grows into large, juicy watermelons that are hydrating and rich in vitamins A and C. Perfect for summer refreshment.

seeds.name: Okra Seeds
seeds.description: Yields green, fibrous pods commonly used in stews and stir-fries. Rich in vitamins and dietary fiber.

tools.name: Hand Trowel
tools.description: A small, handheld tool perfect for digging, planting, and moving soil in your garden.

tools.name: Pruning Shears
tools.description: Sharp, durable shears designed for trimming plants, shrubs, and small branches with precision.

tools.name: Garden Fork
tools.description: A sturdy tool used for loosening soil, aerating lawns, and turning compost with ease.

tools.name: Watering Can
tools.description: A convenient container with a spout, ideal for watering plants gently and evenly.

tools.name: Garden Hoe
tools.description: A strong hoe designed for weeding, cultivating, and breaking up tough soil efficiently.

tools.name: Weeder
tools.description: A specialized tool to remove weeds from the root, making garden maintenance easier.

tools.name: Sprayer
tools.description: A useful tool for applying water, pesticides, or fertilizers evenly across your garden.

tools.name: Rake
tools.description: A versatile tool for gathering leaves, leveling soil, and maintaining a tidy garden.

tools.name: Garden Knife
tools.description: A sharp, multipurpose knife used for cutting plants, harvesting, and grafting.

manure.name: Compost Manure
manure.description: Compost manure is a natural fertilizer made from decomposed organic matter. It improves soil structure, enhances microbial activity, and provides essential nutrients for plant growth.

manure.name: Vermicompost
manure.description: Vermicompost is created by earthworms breaking down organic material, resulting in a highly nutritious and easily absorbable fertilizer that enhances plant health and root growth.

manure.name: Cow Dung Manure
manure.productDetails: Natural manure for a healthy garden.
manure.description: Cow dung manure is a traditional organic fertilizer that enriches the soil with essential nutrients, improves moisture retention, and boosts plant productivity naturally.

manure.name: Chicken Manure
manure.productDetails: High-nutrient manure for enhanced plant growth.
manure.description: Chicken manure is a powerful organic fertilizer rich in nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium, promoting rapid plant growth and improving soil fertility.

manure.name: Neem Cake Manure
manure.productDetails: Neem-based organic fertilizer for plant protection.
manure.description: Neem cake manure acts as both a fertilizer and a natural pesticide, enhancing soil fertility while protecting plants from harmful pests and diseases.

manure.name: Fish Meal Manure
manure.productDetails: Protein-rich fertilizer for strong root growth.
manure.description: Fish meal manure is packed with essential nutrients, including nitrogen and phosphorus, promoting strong root development and vigorous plant growth.

manure.name: Bone Meal Manure
manure.productDetails: High in phosphorous for root development.
manure.description: Bone meal manure is a slow-release organic fertilizer rich in phosphorus, which is essential for strong root growth and healthy flowering plants.

manure.name: Guano Manure
manure.productDetails: Bat guano for rich, organic fertilizer.
manure.description: Guano manure is derived from bat droppings and is an excellent natural fertilizer that enhances soil structure, increases microbial activity, and boosts plant growth.

manure.name: Alfalfa Meal Manure
manure.productDetails: Legume-based organic fertilizer for sustainable growth.
manure.description: Alfalfa meal manure is a plant-based organic fertilizer rich in nitrogen and trace minerals, promoting sustainable plant growth and improving soil health.
